mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name AS name, u.role AS role, GROUP_CONCAT(p.permission_id) AS permissionListStr FROM user_208201302 u LEFT JOIN permission_208201302 p ON p.user_id = u.id AND p.permission_id IN (SELECT id FROM permission_type_208201302 WHERE resource_id = #{resourceId}) WHERE u.role LIKE CONCAT('%', IFNULL(#{role},''), '%') GROUP BY u.id
